translations.Scripting tool which allows administrato: Scripting tool which allows administrators to expand the file options menu.
translations.Allows administrators to write small scr:
Allows administrators to write small scripts which users can run through via the file actions menu in the Files app!

- **üåï Lua:** Script in Lua, its simple and has plenty of online resources.
- **‚ö°Ô∏èEmpower users:** Make hard tasks easy, straight from the Files app.
- **üôã Open to suggestions:** Are you missing a function in the scripting API? Open an issue on Github!
- **ü§ñ Integration with Nextcloud Flow:** allows you to fully automate workflows


‚ö†Ô∏è**Attention** This app requires additional configuration, and may not be suitable for all users. Make sure to read the documentation thoroughly.

‚ö†Ô∏è**Attention** Scripts may modify and delete files permanently. Take care and make sure to read the documentation thoroughly before scripting.
translations.Specify any number of input values the u: Specify any number of input values the user may provide when running this action. These will be accessible to the script via the get_input() function.
translations.Script input name cannot be empty: Script input name cannot be empty

translations.File actions are small Lua scripts that: File actions are small Lua scripts that can create, modify, and/or delete files programmatically. These actions may be triggered by users to be run on their files. Please read the documentation for more information.
translations.File actions are not available because t: File actions are not available because there is no available interpreter. Either install the Lua plugin on the server or enable the experimental interpreter.
translations.Shows file actions directly in the file: Shows file actions directly in the file menu, instead of needing to select it through the 'More actions' modal.
translations.It is highly recommended to run the PHP: It is highly recommended to run the PHP Lua extension on your server. If this is not possible, the experimental Lua interpreter may be used. This interpreter is still under development and may not always produce the expected results.
